title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray
descriptions:
Introducing the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop with the powerful M2 Pro or M2 Max chip. Take on demanding projects with ease, as the M2 Pro offers 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, and up to 32GB unified memory, while the M2 Max boasts 12 CPU cores, up to 38 GPU cores, and up to 96GB unified memory.

Enjoy up to 22 hours of battery life, thanks to the power-efficient design of the M2 Pro or M2 Max chip. Whether you're on the go or plugged in, the MacBook Pro delivers exceptional performance.

Experience lightning-fast performance with all your pro apps, including Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, and Microsoft 365. Plus, enjoy compatibility with your favorite iPhone and iPad apps.

Immerse yourself in stunning visuals with the 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, featuring Extreme Dynamic Range and over 1000 nits of brightness for HDR content. Pro reference modes ensure you can do your best work wherever you are.

Look and sound your best with the 1080p FaceTime HD camera, a studio-quality three-mic array, and a six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio.

Connect all your devices effortlessly with the MagSafe charging port, three Thunderbolt 4 ports, an SDXC card slot, an HDMI port, and a headphone jack. Enjoy seamless wireless connectivity with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3.

The Magic Keyboard comes with a full-height function key row and Touch ID, providing a fast, easy, and secure way to unlock your Mac and sign in to apps and sites.

Experience the power of Apple devices working together. Copy something on your iPhone and paste it on your MacBook Pro. Answer FaceTime calls or send texts with Messages using your MacBook Pro. Plus, enjoy the durability of the all-aluminum unibody enclosure and free software updates that keep your device running smoothly and securely for years to come.

Upgrade to the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop and elevate your productivity and creativity to new heights.

Introducing the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop with the powerful M2 Pro or M2 Max chip. With up to 12 CPU cores and 19 or 38 GPU cores, along with up to 96GB unified memory, this laptop is perfect for handling demanding projects. Enjoy up to 22 hours of battery life and exceptional performance, whether you're on the go or plugged in.

Experience lightning-fast performance with your favorite pro apps, including Adobe Creative Cloud and Microsoft 365. The stunning 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with Extreme Dynamic Range and over 1000 nits of brightness ensures a beautiful visual experience. The advanced camera and audio features, including a 1080p FaceTime HD camera, studio-quality three-mic array, and six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio, will make you look and sound great.

Stay connected with the MagSafe charging port, three Thunderbolt 4 ports, SDXC card slot, HDMI port, and headphone jack. Enjoy seamless wireless connectivity with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3. The Magic Keyboard with Touch ID provides a secure and convenient way to unlock your Mac and sign in to apps and sites.

Experience the power of integration with all your Apple devices. Copy and paste between iPhone and MacBook Pro, answer FaceTime calls, and send texts with Messages, all from your MacBook Pro. Built with an all-aluminum unibody enclosure, this laptop is exceptionally durable. With free software updates, your MacBook Pro will continue to run smoothly and securely for years to come. 

Don't miss out on the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop - the ultimate tool for productivity and creativity.

With up to 22 hours of battery life, you can tackle demanding projects all day long. Experience lightning-fast performance with your favorite pro apps, including Adobe Creative Cloud and Microsoft 365. The stunning 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display with Extreme Dynamic Range and over 1000 nits of brightness is perfect for creating and viewing HDR content. Capture sharp video with the 1080p FaceTime HD camera and enjoy studio-quality audio with the three-mic array and six-speaker sound system. Connect all your devices with the MagSafe charging port, Thunderbolt 4 ports, SDXC card slot, HDMI port, and headphone jack. Unlock your Mac and sign in to apps and sites effortlessly with the Magic Keyboard and Touch ID. Seamlessly integrate with your other Apple devices, allowing you to easily copy and paste between iPhone and MacBook Pro, answer FaceTime calls, and send texts. Built to last with an all-aluminum unibody enclosure, this laptop ensures years of smooth and secure performance. Experience the future of computing with the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop.

The MacBook Pro works seamlessly with your other Apple devices, allowing you to copy and paste between iPhone and MacBook Pro, answer FaceTime calls, send texts with Messages, and more.

Built to last, the all-aluminum unibody enclosure ensures exceptional durability. Plus, free software updates keep your MacBook Pro running smoothly and securely for years to come.

Upgrade your productivity and creativity with the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop.

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray

Description: SUPERCHARGED BY M2 PRO OR M2 MAX — Take on demanding projects with the M2 Pro or M2 Max chip. M2 Pro has 12 CPU cores, 19 GPU cores, and up to 32GB unified memory. M2 Max has 12 CPU cores, up to 38 GPU cores, and up to 96GB unified memory.

UP TO 22 HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE — Go all day thanks to the power-efficient design of the M2 Pro or M2 Max chip. And the MacBook Pro laptop delivers exceptional performance whether it’s running on battery or plugged in.

FULLY COMPATIBLE — All your pro apps run lightning fast — including Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, Microsoft 365, and many of your favorite iPhone and iPad apps.

BEAUTIFUL PRO DISPLAY — The 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display features Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits of brightness for stunning HDR content, and pro reference modes for doing your best work on the go.

ADVANCED CAMERA AND AUDIO — Look sharp and sound great with a 1080p FaceTime HD camera, a studio-quality three-mic array, and a six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio.

CONNECT WHAT YOU WANT — MacBook Pro features a MagSafe charging port, three Thunderbolt 4 ports, an SDXC card slot, an HDMI port, and a headphone jack. And enjoy seamless wireless connectivity with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3.

MAGIC KEYBOARD WITH TOUCH ID — Magic Keyboard comes with a full-height function key row and Touch ID, which gives you a fast, easy, secure way to unlock your Mac and sign in to apps and sites.


   WORKS WITH ALL YOUR APPLE DEVICES — You can do amazing things when you use your Apple devices together. Copy something on iPhone and paste it on MacBook Pro. Use your MacBook Pro to answer FaceTime calls or send texts with Messages. And that’s just the beginning. BUILT TO LAST — The all-aluminum unibody enclosure is exceptionally durable. Free software updates keep things running smoothly and securely for years to come. LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See legal disclaimers below.   Show more
